page.title: 05CHILD'S VIEW OF E.ALLINGTON
page.content: We asked all the junior school children what they particularly enjoyed about living in our area and here are some of their replies---- It's so quiet and there is no traffic noise like in a town...it's near the sea...lots of fields to play in...it's peaceful and there are lots of creatures to watch...there's lots of really fresh air which doesn't smell of car fumes...there's lots to do because of the flowers and trees...you don't get bored if you live on a farm because there are always jobs to do...it's a place close to Nature and you can sleep at night because the traffic noise doesn't keep you awake. Some of the things they did not enjoy were..too far from shops..few friends nearby...it sometimes looks untidy because people leave litter..no museums or zebra crossings..
